nodes.text: Bola Quo was a resident of Nothoiin during the Clone Wars.

Quo was interviewed by Nik Kigee of The Coruscant Holo Net after the planet was attacked by the bounty hunter Zatch and a gang of Trandoshan mercenaries, and reported seeing Zatch's swoop bike "go down in a ball of flames" after coming under fire from Anakin Skywalker.
